New Records: Emilio Nsue scored a hat-trick, the first for Equatorial Guinea at the Africa Cup since 2008
Pre-Game Insights: Equatorial Guinea had drawn 1-1 against Nigeria in their previous match
Post-Match Reflections: The victory moved Equatorial Guinea to the top of Group A with four points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the 2024 Africa Cup Group A stage
